nodes.text: B'nish was a planet in the galaxy. The Human girl First was held there as a slave until her escape around 41.5 ABY. The B'nishi were native to the world.

B'nish was briefly mentioned in the short story "First Blood" by Christie Golden. The exact location of B'nish was not revealed, nor was its designation as a city, planet, or some other type of location. However, as the name of the planet on which the majority of "First Blood" takes place is never given, it is possible that the story takes place on B'nish, which was confirmed as a planet in the 2011 novel Fate of the Jedi: Ascension and 2012 novel Fate of the Jedi: Apocalypse.
